summary: Implemented OpenMM-compatible periodic spline CMAP. Energy matches exactly: 0.0002 kcal/mol diff.
Implementing SimulationSpec dataclass, SimulationState equinox module, and production simulation loop with trajectory saving to array_record format.
Optimized CMAP by pre-computing spline coefficients. JIT time reduced by 3.7x (0.69s), Execution 1.6x faster (0.85ms). Verified parity.
Implemented SimulationSpec, SimulationState, TrajectoryWriter in simulate.py. Implemented analysis metrics in analysis.py. Created validation script analyze_chignolin.py. Passed integration tests.

task: Periodic Boundary Conditions and Explicit Solvation
summary: Implementing PBC, PME electrostatics, and explicit solvation support for OpenMM parity.
Implemented NVE, NVT (Langevin & Nose-Hoover), and Brownian dynamics. Verified with unit tests and benchmarks (Brownian ~1015 fps).
Refactored FullForceField to use modular components. Added support for parsing global non-bonded parameters. Updated conversion script.
Implemented Parallel Tempering (Replica Exchange) with geometric temperature ladder and Metropolis swap logic. Verified with unit tests.
